mapper.select: select count(*) from cart where userId = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into cart(userId, bookName, category, imgUrl, bookIsbn, price, amount) values (#{userId}, #{bookName}, #{category}, #{imgUrl}, #{bookIsbn}, #{price}, #{amount})
insert into pay (userId, bookName, category, imgUrl, bookIsbn, price, amount) select userId, bookName, category, imgUrl, bookIsbn, price, amount from cart where userId = #{userId}
mapper.delete: delete from cart where userId = #{userId} AND bookName=#{bookName}
mapper.select: select sum(price*amount) from cart where userId = #{userId}
